Description: Create a new wishlist save items, including properties, experiences, or services
Delete an existing wishlist, including all existing items in this wishlist.
Add an item (properties, experiences, or services) into an existing wishlist.
Remove an item from an existing wishlist.
Send a message or inquiry to a property owner or service provider.
Create a reservation for a property. Use this policy when neither duration of reservation or cost per day of the reservation is specified, otherwise use the create_reservation_with_limit policy
Create a reservation for a property, if only the duration of the reservation is ${duration} day and the cost per day is less than ${cost_per_day} dollars.
Args: {"duration": {"type": "number", "description": "The number of days for the reservation"}, "cost_per_day": {"type": "number", "description": "The maximum cost per day for the reservation"}}

Description: Submit a new rating or written review for a properties, experiences, or services.
Submit a new rating or written review for a properties, experiences, or services, where the rating must be exactly ${number_of_stars} stars.
Args: {"number_of_stars": {"type": "number", "description": "The exact number of stars for the review"}}

Description: Modify user account preferences or notification settings.
Publish a listing for properties, experiences, or services, i.e. becoming a host for property.
